name: snykTask
author: Snyk
instanceNameFormat: Snyk scan for open source vulnerabilities

inputs.name: stepDisplayName
inputs.label: Step Display Name
inputs.defaultValue: Snyk scan for open source vulnerabilities

inputs.name: serviceConnectionEndpoint
inputs.label: Snyk API Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose your Snyk service connection from your Azure DevOps project settings.

inputs.name: project-name
inputs.label: Project name in Snyk
inputs.helpMarkDown: What you want to call (or already have called) this project in Snyk

inputs.name: target-file
inputs.label: Relative path to manifest file to test
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path to manifest file to test

inputs.name: severity-threshold
inputs.label: The testing severity threshold
inputs.helpMarkDown: The testing severity threshold. Leave blank for no threshold.

inputs.name: fail-on-issues
inputs.label: Should cause Pipeline to fail if vulnerability/license issues are found

inputs.name: monitor-on-build
inputs.label: Run the Snyk monitor after test?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select true if you want to run the monitor the dependency tree within Snyk.

inputs.name: additional-arguments
inputs.label: Additional command-line args for Snyk CLI (advanced)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional command-line args for Snyk CLI (advanced)
